page.title: 18Outdoor Sports
page.content: Llandovery can boast a variety of {sports clubs.}These include the following{rugby,soccer,cricket,tennis, {archery,ladies hockey}and{bowling. the{1st Rugby XV}did very well this year and after beating,Loughor, Tumble and Kenfig Hillin the preliminary rounds of the schweppes cup,Llandovery faced{Pontypridd}(a first class side) in the second round.The result was a devasting 21:6 victory for Llandovery.The next draw was what everyone wanted, {Llanelli}who turned out to be the eventual winners.The result was a 44:6 victory for the visitors Llanelli.The score did not reflect the way Llandovery played in front of a vast crowd.
